overview: Set in a beach community during summer of surf and sexy curves. A fast-paced and crazy crime-comedy from down under; Get Rich Quick tells the story of a corrupt detective who interrogates an unlucky surfer suspected of robbery. The interview reveals much more, leading to a month of madness for the detective as he chases down a bunch of unsavory characters in a series of interconnected and outlandish crime-stories throughout the underbelly of Sidney.
title: Get Rich Quick
